segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures a moment of quiet disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, drying a plate with care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unaware that the faucet is causing an overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades down, soaking everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she remains oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to no good on the other side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances precariously on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's dipping into the cookie jar secretly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, expectant and hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking how they're risking it all for sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden view outside makes it worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of worry for what might happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR
